text: 3.5 Luk 1.59, Apo 23.6, 26.5, Lom 11.1, 2 Ko 11.22 Yɨp tɨkɨl ñɨn anep kugul ak mɨdɨl, wak ak tɨbɨlɨkɨlak. Yad bɨ Yislel yɨpɨd gɨl, bɨ based Bejamin jɨj ak nɨm mɨdebin. Yad Hiblu takaw ak pel apin, nap nɨsed abe agelɨgɨpal. Pen yad bɨ Pelisi yenek tek, Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak mɨdupsek nɨgtep gɨl kɨdek gelɨgɨpin.
